titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the President should implement Recommendation 9 of the Iraq Study Group Report.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and South Asia .

bill.summary:
1/23/2007--Introduced.
Resolves that the President should implement Recommendation 9 of the Iraq Study Group Report. (The report's Recommendation 9 urges the United States to engage directly with Iran and Syria and to consider incentives, as well as disincentives, in seeking constructive results.)
